_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ProofOfReexportationRequest.description: A document requesting the status or proof that goods have been re-exported

ProofOfReexportationRequest.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Details
ProofOfReexportationRequest.description: A document requesting the status or proof that goods have been re-exported

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies the current version of this request for proof

GoodsItemPassportID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Goods Item Passport. Identifier
GoodsItemPassportID.description: The identifier of the goods item passport or ATA Carnet of the goods

GoodsItemPassportCounterfoilID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Identifier
GoodsItemPassportCounterfoilID.description: A reference to a counterfoil of the goods item passport or ATA Carnet

ImportingGuarantorParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Importing Guarantor_ Party. Party
ImportingGuarantorParty.description: The party (often chambers of commerce) who issues this document on behalf of their customs authority.

ExportingGuarantorParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Exporting Guarantor_ Party. Party
ExportingGuarantorParty.description: The party (often chambers of commerce) who are fiscally responsible for the Goods Item Passort counterfoils associated with this document.

ImportingCustomsParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Importing Customs_ Party. Party
ImportingCustomsParty.description: The original requester of the proof of reexportation.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: One or more references to additional documents related to this request

Signature.title: Proof Of Reexportation Request. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
